public method configlist::comparison_value (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in comparison_value: 6
sub comparison_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    $val = [] if not defined($val);
    my $str = join(',', @{$val});
    return($str);
}
public method configlist::display_value (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in display_value: 7
sub display_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    return '&nbsp;' if not defined($val);
    my $str = join(','.CGI::br(), @{$val});
    $str = '&nbsp;' if $str !~  /\S/;
    return $str;
}
public method configlist::entry_widget (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in entry_widget: 13
sub entry_widget {
    my ($self, $name, $default) = @_;

    $default = [] if not defined($default);
    my $str = join(', ', @{$default});
    $str = '' if $str !~ /\S/;
    return CGI::textarea(
        -name => $name,
        -rows => 4,
        -value => $str,
        -columns => 25,
    );
}
public method configlist::save_string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in save_string: 21
sub save_string {
    my ($self, $oldval, $newvalsource) = @_;
    my $newval = $self->convert_newval_source($newvalsource);
    my $varname = $self->{var};
    $oldval = $self->comparison_value($oldval);
    return '' if($oldval eq $newval);
    my $str = '';

    $oldval =~ s/^\s*(.*)\s*$/$1/;
    $newval =~ s/^\s*(.*)\s*$/$1/;
    $oldval =~ s/[\s,]+/,/sg;
    $newval =~ s/[\s,]+/,/sg;
    return '' if($newval eq $oldval);
    # ok we really have a new value, now turn it back into a string
    my @parts = split ',', $newval;
    map { $_ =~ s/['"`]//g } @parts; #`"'geditsucks
    @parts = map { "'". $_ ."'" } @parts;
    $str = join(',', @parts);
    $str = '$'. $varname . " = [$str];\n";
    return($str);
}
